    Popular Videos

    How to choose sources for your paper (01:45)
    Selecting the correct sources helps bolster the strength of your argument. Learn how to evaluate your sources for currency, relevance, authority, accuracy, and purpose.
    How do I locate a peer-reviewed journal? (01:52)
    Peer-reviewed journals are found throughout the library. Learn how to easily locate these journals in our collection.
    Getting to know the library (02:49)
    Learn about the resources and services we offer to help move your research forward.
